website_summaries.verdict: Whether you want a pair of high heels for a formal occasion or a night on the town, these shoes are a good pick as they sport a simplistic yet timeless style.
pros: Versatile to wear with a variety of styles
Open-toe design with ankle straps are ideal for summery looks
cons: Somewhat uncomfortable if you are on your feet for extended periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Love these !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm seriously obsessed with these shoes! I have them in 4 different colours: white, black, light blue (which is really grey) and natural. I'm normally a size 9.5 but got a 9 and they fit perfectly. Also because of the thick strap, these shoes are super comfortable; not to mention very classy & chic.
customer_reviews.author: Jenichka Kalash

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I received my shoes in record time. The product description states the heel is 3.75. When I received the shoes and tried them on, the heels looked to be about 3.5. Which is perfectly fine. Needless to say, they are adorable. They look just like the pic (lavender). They were comfortable, sexy and stylish. They match perfectly with my ensemble. I have a wide foot (medium width), so I was concerned about the band, but the fit was PERFECTO! I recommend this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, comfy, fabulous Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous!! absolutely love my blush pink fur shoes, they went perfect with my velvet dress for my birthday and they are true to size and very comfortable I have wide feet so they do work for wide feet as well!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. I love them. I shut the place down with these lovelies.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Reed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful heel!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a wedding and they did not disappoint! Beautiful, classy look, nice height for the heel. They do get a bit uncomfortable over a long period of time, but I was impressed with how comfortable they were overall. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Scahill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color. These may be a tiny bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. These may be a tiny bit too small in the width, but they are suede and most likely will stretch a bit.
customer_reviews.author: shoe llover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sandles!
customer_reviews.text: These are gray, not light blue but that is what I wanted. Beautiful sandles!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea MacVarish

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoes so much that I ordered another pair when my dog chewed the strap on one.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Allan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect height and the perfect look. Comfortable to walk in and goes with everything. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful and the heel is the perfect height. The toe part was a bit wide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short straps
customer_reviews.text: The straps for around my ankle were a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: AVR

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Strap LITERALLY broke within 2 minutes of putting them on. I had to cut the straps off to go to my event. Highly upset 😡
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Harding

customer_reviews.title: "Light Blue" is actually "Gray"
customer_reviews.text: The color name is "Light Blue" but really they are gray which is good because I got them to wear to my daughter's wedding with a silver/gray dress and they match beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Christine
